name: e2e-tests
description: Set of E2E tests for react-native-keyboard-controller package

scripts.test-example:android: detox test --configuration example.android.emu.release --loglevel verbose --take-screenshots failing --record-videos failing
scripts.test-example:ios: detox test --configuration example.ios.sim.release --loglevel verbose --take-screenshots failing --record-videos failing

author: Kiryl Ziusko <zyusko.kirik@gmail.com> (https://github.com/kirillzyusko)
